definition: To show that you strongly approve of a person or action.

images.description: Two people, one in the foreground and one in the background, are shown clapping and smiling.

images.alt: Photo of people with thumbs up.
images.description: Two people stand together, smiling at the viewer. Each person holds their hand up with fingers curled into a fist and a thumb pointing up.

definition: Something that can decompose or break down naturally.
An area where trash that has been collected is brought and buried underground.

images.alt: Photo of a large pile of trash.
images.description: A large pile of trash made up of plastic, metal, paper, wood, garbage, plants, and more. The materials are mixed together into a single, large heap of material.

definition: Another word for oil, petroleum is a fuel that is made up of the decomposed remains of living things. There is a limited amount of petroleum in the world.

images.alt: Photo of an ship built to transport oil.
images.description: A very long, large ship is shown moving over water, away from the viewer. The deck, or top surface, of the ship is large and flat. A  structure of several stories rises from the flat deck at the back of the ship.

definition: A powder that, when mixed with a liquid, creates an ink, paint, or dye.

images.alt: Photo of pieces of colored chalk.
images.description: Six rectangular shaped pieces of chalk on a flat surface. There is one piece of chalk in the foreground, and each remaining piece of chalk is lined up behind the one before it. Each piece of chalk is a different color. From front to back, the colors of the pieces of chalk are: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple.

definition: Things that are needed for a society or organization to run well. Natural resources are things from nature that are needed for human society to run well.

images.alt: Photo of water with tree-covered hill in background.
images.description: Mist rises from an area of water. The water has many colors in it, including yellow, gray, white, and brown. A tree-covered hill is in the background, partly hidden by the mist rising from the water.
